parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: 0-based index of the row, -1 to set a column equation

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

title: ITableAnnotation.SetCellEquation
description: Sets the specified equation for the specified row and column of this BOM table.
signature:
System.Int32 SetCellEquation( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
,
   System.String
Equation
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: 0-based index of the row, -1 to set a column equation

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

returns: Return code as defined in swCellEquationStatus_e
remarks:
After calling this method, call
IModelDoc2::EditRebuild3
to refresh the table in the user interface.

examples.title: Get and Set BOM Column Types and Cell Equations (VBA)
